name: continuwuity
description: Continuwuity is a self-hosted task tracking and journaling system designed for Software Engineering practices. It supports project organization, time tracking, and streamlines daily work logs.

features.title: Task Tracking
features.description: Monitor project progress and individual tasks efficiently. Stay on top of work

features.title: Work Journaling
features.description: Document daily activities and decisions automatically. Build a knowledge base

features.title: Time Tracking
features.description: Log hours spent on projects and tasks. Accurate billing and reporting

features.title: Project Organization
features.description: Structure work by projects and milestones. Clear visibility into progress

features.title: Engineering Focus
features.description: Built specifically for software development workflows. Speaks your language

features.title: Self-Hosted
features.description: Keep your work logs and project data private. Your productivity, your server
